posts.html:
@XTwistedsoulX: actually, it works. The rule about determinating what a spell costs is that you first add at its mana cost every addictional cost, then you apply every cost reduction. So if I want to play a Capsize with buyback and with 4 medallions in play, the calculation goes: + (buyback) - (medallions) = .

Those medallions are a lot of aceleration, in that if you cast 2 spell of the appropriate color is like that they add to your mana pool for each medallion. They need a reprint! I've already bought the playset of the blu one, now I'm looking for the red one...!

5/5
Report Abuse

posts.post_content:
Very nice card in all esper decks, also works wonder with mirrodin block.  
  
Also lovely interaction with [Etherium Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etherium Sculptor), [Stormscape Familiar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stormscape Familiar) and [Lodestone Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lodestone Golem). You can also add [Sphere of Resistance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphere of Resistance) For some total control.
posts.html:
